title: Smoke Bomb
info: Smoke Bombs are throwable, consumable novelty items that, when thrown, emit thick gray smoke for one minute. Upon throwing a smoke bomb, it will bounce or roll until it comes to a complete stop and continues to release smoke. Each can only be used once and cannot be picked up again once thrown. They are purchased from the Party Girl for 20 each.
